title: I Was So Mad
description:
Mercer Mayer’s Little Critter is having quite the grumpy day in this classic, funny, and heartwarming book.Here, the Critter family says 'No' to just about everything Little Critter wants to do. He can't keep frogs in the tub, or help paint the house. Finally, mad at the world, Little Critter announces he won't put up with it anymore! Thankfully, he latter reconsiders. Whether he’s cranky on the slide or stubborn in the sandbox, everyone will relate to this beloved story. A perfect way to teach children about their emotions and how to deal with them!
Mercer Mayer's
 
Little Critter
 stories, which address all the major issues of growing up, are perennial favorites of parents and children alike.
author: Mercer Mayer
